txt.en: In the meadhall of Harwick, a meeting is taking place between Harding and his Captain, Agelmund. The Easterlings are advancing into the Wold, and the Rohirrim are hard pressed to keep their defences secure.
'We should leave before Harding changes his mind and decides to put you in jail for questioning. Let me know when you're ready to go.'
Harding and Captain Agelmund are discussing the recent attacks by the Easterlings, and what else has set in motion around Harwick.
'Who are you, stranger, to interrupt my council? I told the guard I was not to be disturbed, save for critically important matters.\n\n'Speak up! What dire news have you?'
Harding and Captain Agelmund are discussing the recent attacks by the Easterlings, and what else has set in motion around Harwick.
Harding and Captain Agelmund are meeting on the Officers balcony of the Meadhall.
'I'll take you to Feldburg right away.'
Harding and Captain Agelmund are meeting on the Officers' balcony of the Mead Hall.
Observe the meeting of Harding and his Captain
Speak with Agelmund, Captain of the Wold
